refnamediv.refpurpose: The configuration file for Remote Telescope System, 2nd version

refsect1.title: ABOUT
refsect1.para: RTS2 is targeted for autonomous observations using robotic telescopes.

refsect1.title: RTS2 COMPONENTS
refsect1.para: RTS2 consists of three basic types of components:

refsect1.title: CENTRALD
refsect1.para: rts2-centrald is used to provide name resolution service for RTS2 system. Each device or service register to at least one centrald. Centrald handles state transitons during day and night (day, dusk, evening, night, dawn and morning.

refsect1.title: RTS2 STATES
refsect1.para: ON and STANDBY states can have following substates. They are changed during day by rts2-centrald (1).

listitem.para: During day, observatory is in idle state. CCDs are not cooled. Imgproc might run image and observation processing from last night.
CCDs are cooled during evening. Light intensiti is still too high to take images, and cameras are not cooled to take dark images.
Cooled CCDs are used to take flat frames.
Observations are performed out during night.
Similar to dusk. Flat frames and darks are taken.
CCDs are tempered to ambient temperature.

refsect1.title: SERVICES
refsect1.para: rts2-executor (1), rts2-selector (1), rts2-imgproc (1), rts2-grbd (1), rts2-soapd (1), rts2-augershooter (1)

refsect1.title: MONITORING AND MANAGING UTILITIES
refsect1.para: rts2-mon (1), rts2-target (1), rts2-targetinfo (1), rts2-focusc (1), rts2-xfocusc (1), rts2-seltest (1)
